title: Academic Russian: Economics
text:
The project is devoted to the methodology of creating corpus-based digital training platforms for learning Russian as a foreign language for academic and professional purposes. The platfrom generates different types of grammatical and lexical exercises based on a list of the most frequent terms and collocations that foreign students encounter when reading professional texts. The first part of the project develops digital platform in Russian as a foreign language for economists.
The project involves the staff of the School of Linguistics and the International Laboratory of Language Convergence of the National Research University Higher School of Economics: E. V. Rakhilina, N. I. Kikilo, K. K. Kashleva, G. A. Moroz, A. A. Ivanenko, O. S. Eremina.
The project ‚ÄúAcademic Russian to Foreigners: Methodology of Corpus-Based Digital Training Platforms‚Äù was implemented under grant #075-15-2023-363 within the Strategic Project ‚ÄúDigital Transformation: Technologies, Effects and Efficiency‚Äù of the Priority-2030 program.
